snippet: The United States and Brazil will play a first-round Davis Cup match in February in Jacksonville, Fla. The American team played all three of its matches on the road this year.
lead_paragraph: The United States and Brazil will play a first-round Davis Cup match in February in Jacksonville, Fla. The American team played all three of its matches on the road this year.

headline.seo: US and Brazil to Play Davis Cup Tennis Match in Jacksonville
headline.main: US and Brazil to Play Davis Cup Tennis Match in Jacksonville
